https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1yq7OeEcYSxNjVPmGRBVzSPLHmc.jpg Haesu moves to another city and opens a cafe to start her new life. Yejin, a high school girl and frequent customer, starts to work at the cafe and falls for Haesu. Yejin confesses her love to Haesu when she is sure about her feelings. Between the Seasons
